summary: The Automotive Support Services to Improve Safe Transportation Act of 2025 (ASSIST Act of 2025) aims to amend Title 38 of the United States Code to clarify the Department of Veterans Affairs' (VA) definition of medical services to explicitly include medically necessary automobile adaptations. These adaptations encompass various modifications like ramp and kneeling systems, raised doors, mobility device lifts, and wheelchair tiedowns, ensuring veterans have access to necessary vehicle modifications.
